title: Quarkus gRPC YAML configuration not working for scan-for-imports
body:
### Describe the bug

The configuration for gRPC to scan for imports in dependencies does not work when configuration is in YAML. 

This works. 
application.properties
`quarkus.generate-code.grpc.scan-for-imports=all`

This does not.
application.yaml
```
quarkus:
  generate-code:
    grpc:
      scan-for-imports: all
```

### Expected behavior

I expect the yaml configuration to work exactly as the properties configuration does. 

### Actual behavior

The yaml config is ignored. 

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_
